txt.en: '...and then the Giant entered the town of Stock, crying out in anger...'
'...but before she could catch her naughty child, he fell off the rock and into the river...'
'...and that is why we stay far away from the borders of the Shire.  We do not want the white wolves to attack!'
'...with quick steps, she stumbled through the garden, her greedy arms filled with mushrooms...'
